channel.title: How can I change the direction of my thieveing stall!?
channel.description:
Project Insanity source.
When I thieve my stall it won't let me thieve it because I can only thieve it from 1 direction which is the back of the stall, how can I make it so you can thieve the stall any direction. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- or, how can I just move the stalls direction, (not the coords, the way it's facing, move the face where you thieve it to south instead of north)?
Regards, James.

item.title: How can I change the direction of my thieveing stall!?
